Articles.Content:
yee who seeks to cross the bridge of death must answer me these questions 3.

what is your name?

what is your quest?

what is the weakness of the death star?

well the rules are you answer the questions of the player above, then retype the first 2 as they are and then you pull trivia for the 3rd

EG:

person1: what is your name?

what is your quest?

What is the name of the creator of the daleks

Person 2: person 2

to launch missles and exterminate!

Davros

What is your name?

What is your quest?

what is the air speed velocity of a coconut laden swallow

Edited October 19, 2012 by zapy97

Mr_Destroyer

Get across the bridge

(thinks: OH NO I DONT WATCH STAR TREK)

Its fictional.

what is your name?

what is your quest?

what is the air speed velocity of jebediah kerman

Mr. Chicken

Divide by zero

42 (units may vary)

what is your quest?

what is the air speed velocity of jebediah kerman?

If a man eats himself, would he double size or disappear?

<ERROR: WRONG QUESTIONS. FAILED TO ANSWER.>

What is your name?

What is your quest?

What do you think about the server catastrophe in April 2013?

Classified by the RCAF and my own paranoia

To rebuild the Prussian Empire! Or at least my art thread

It gave me a good chance to rebuild my thread, but I'm pained at the loss of the sixty thousand views it had

What is your name?

What is your quest?

What.... is the purpose of a rubber duck?

Some call me Bond, Some call me Fly. I forgot my name a long time ago.

To help Fanworkians live off their small or nonexistent reputation paychecks.

They can be used as impromptu command pod hatch seals.

What Is Your Name?

What Is Your Quest?

What Is Your Favorite Household Use Of Blutonium-937?

ROFL

To create Mass Relays out of superconductors

A disinfectant for multi-cellular life

What is your Name?

What is your Quest?

What is the square root of rope?

Rockcoole Rock III

To find the great question of life the universe and everything

3

What is your Name?

What is your Quest?

What is the point of Burger King?

Jedediah Kerman

To Teach my son Jebediah that space DOES NOT EQUAL ground

To Provide Food for the 'nauts up there.

What is your Name?

What is your Quest?

What should I use to whack Jebediah with when he fails one of my lessons?

Freya (obvious alias)

To consume ALL Toblerones

A Harisen

What is your Name?

What is your Quest?

What is the exact output of a Pratt & Whitney R-1340-AN-1 Wasp radial engine?

Designer225

Space Station Construction

What are you talking about?

What is your name?

What is your quest?

Which engine is more efficient, the Mainsail, the Poodle, the LV-T30, the LV-T45, the LV-N, or the LV-909?

zapy97 THE SUPREME DALEK!

to exterminate all non dalek life

LV-N nummy

What is you name?!

What is your quest?!

What is the most powerful Battle cruiser in KSP

lol great to see my game catching on

Dead

To blow up Jool

Jebediah Kerman

What is your name?

What is your quest?

If Jebediah Kerman dies and turns into a zombie, what will happen?

Zapy97 the supreme dalek! (yeah bow to me inferior lifeforms)

to extract the wet core of kerbin

he will fall before the Daleks

what is your name, explain explain explain explain!

what is your purpose Explain

why are you not all zombies

It is Arthur, King of the Britons

To seek the Holy Grail

What do you mean, an African or European Zombie?

What Is your name?

What Is your quest

What is your favorite color?

Designer225

Getting Kerbals to Duna and back.

You are already seeing it.

What is your name?

What is your quest?

What's the orbital speed of Pluto?

By the way: If you can't find the answer of the three questions Flymetothemun asked, you are colorblind.

Icrashrockets

To keep Jeb from eating all the snacks

What am I, smart? (In other words I have no idea)

What is your name?

What is your quest?

Is the statement "this statement is false" true?

Lord Potato

To bring justice to the potatoes of the world.

Maybe.

What is your name?

What is your quest?

What is the square root of water bottle?

Maverick Sawyer.

Get to Jool someday.

A half-full glass of water?

What is your name?

What is your quest?

What is terminal velocity of a typical Kerbal (Not FAR)?

Helix935

to perfect my rocket designs

very fast

What is your name?

what is your quest?

Am I lying about this sentence?

Palladium Corporation

To seek the Holy Grail (of space exploration)

That is a question, not a sentence therefore you can not possibly be lying.

What is your name?

What is your quest?

Is this a rhetorical question?

MaverickSawyer.

To make it to Jool.

Uhhh.... AAAAAAAHHHHHH!!!!

*foomph*

What is your name?

What is your quest?

What is the most powerful rocket engine available in KSP without using a .cfg edit (I.E. as provided from the factory)?

Flymetothemun the Average.

To manufacture large quantities of air without using any oxygen.

The one that Jebediah has in "the trunk" of his "car".

What is your name?

What is your quest?

What is the atomic weight of Unobtainium?

The Powerful and Almighty Sir MrrPamplemousse.

Avenge the death of the kraken overlord's son.

23.06

What is your Name?

What is your Quest?

What is the viscosity of Liquid Helium II?
